thread.title: Amerlux速 Insigna: LED Luminaires Light-worthy of a Hollywood premiere
thread.title_full: Amerlux速 Insigna: LED Luminaires Light-worthy of a Hollywood premiere

author: admin
title: Amerlux速 Insigna: LED Luminaires Light-worthy of a Hollywood premiere
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 12:04 PM   Amerlux 
OAKLAND, N.J., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Amerlux速 introduces "a new linear era" in flood lighting with Insigna, a family of LED exterior luminaires that provide the power to light up an entire building, wall or billboard. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150916/267252 
"The new Insigna provides superior architectural flood lighting for exterior signage, wall washing and landscape illumination," says Amerlux President/CEO Chuck Campagna. "This unique, cool-running linear fixture features a variety of beam patterns, amazing output, sealed optics and an integrated or remote driver." 
The LED Linear System is configured in a single row and available in three, four, six and eight LED modules. The exterior luminaires are available in 3000K, 4000K and 5000K CCTs, and up to 13 different beam patterns. The fixtures deliver up to 29,570 lumens, with a high efficacy up to 92 lumens per watt. 
Insigna is compatible with universal 120-277 volt systems with auto-sensing and 0-10V dimming. 
The exterior luminaires are constructed with a die cast aluminum faceplate and an extruded aluminum enclosure with IP67 sealed optical modules. 
Insigna comes in 18", 24", 36" and 48" versions to cover any job, from small wall wash canopy lighting to large-scale architectural detail illumination. Direct mounting is standard, including tenon and mast mounting. 
Options include a remote driver and external glare shield. 
About Amerlux LLC 
Amerlux understands the power of light and its connection to both mind and body. The company uses this understanding to create products that deliver real benefits and extraordinary value. Lighting is so much more than just watts and lumens. Amerlux Lighting captivates and motivates, creating unique visual experiences for every environment, worldwide. A global trailblazer in lighting technology and design, Amerlux understands that the true power of light is not measured in lumens alone, but ultimately in the human responses it creates. 
Brilliant innovators in its brand-new Oakland, N.J., headquarters, the company develops, manufactures, and delivers amazing architectural grade lighting solutions that span virtually every interior and exterior application--and leads the industry in integrated intelligent systems. Let Amerlux change the way you view light.
